title: Introduction

description: Mark and track key events that impact your website traffic by clicking directly on your analytics graphs

description: Track how much time visitors spend on each section of your website and understand visitor frequency patterns for better saturation strategies

content: Master the art of funnel optimization by understanding visitor stages, re-engagement tactics, timing optimization, and practical implementation strategies that drive conversions
description: Master the art of funnel optimization by understanding visitor stages, re-engagement tactics, timing optimization, and practical implementation strategies that drive conversions

description: Master the art of ad saturation by understanding half-life psychology, impression frequency optimization, and strategic campaign sequencing to maximize conversion potential

title: Contact us

title: API Introduction
content: Welcome to Landing Analytics REST API - The analytics platform built for founders. Build custom dashboards, feed AI systems, and integrate with your own systems.
description: Welcome to Landing Analytics REST API - The analytics platform built for founders. Build custom dashboards, feed AI systems, and integrate with your own systems.

title: Create or Update Flag
content: Create a new flag for the project or update an existing one using the POST /flag/{id_project} endpoint
description: Create a new flag for the project or update an existing one using the POST /flag/{id_project} endpoint

title: Get Alternative
content: Retrieve detailed information about a specific alternative including sections and status using GET /alternative/{id_project}/{id_alternative}
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific alternative including sections and status using GET /alternative/{id_project}/{id_alternative}

title: Get Current Scenario
content: Retrieve the current running scenario constructed from tracking data with calculated winner using GET /current_scenario/{id_project}
description: Retrieve the current running scenario constructed from tracking data with calculated winner using GET /current_scenario/{id_project}

title: Get Depth Graph
content: Retrieve the graph showing impressions and time spent per section for current tracking alternatives using GET /depth_graph/{id_project}
description: Retrieve the graph showing impressions and time spent per section for current tracking alternatives using GET /depth_graph/{id_project}

title: Get Depth Overview
content: Retrieve overview statistics categorized by UTM, countries, language, referrer, and device type using GET /depth_overview/{id_project}
description: Retrieve overview statistics categorized by UTM, countries, language, referrer, and device type using GET /depth_overview/{id_project}

title: Get Depth Statistics
content: Retrieve comprehensive statistics across all current alternatives including visitors, traffic, popular sections, etc. using GET /depth_stats/{id_project}
description: Retrieve comprehensive statistics across all current alternatives including visitors, traffic, popular sections, etc. using GET /depth_stats/{id_project}

title: Get Flag Graph
content: Retrieve the cumulative flag graph across all alternatives and scenarios with impressions using GET /flag_graph/{id_project}
description: Retrieve the cumulative flag graph across all alternatives and scenarios with impressions using GET /flag_graph/{id_project}

title: Get All Flags
content: Retrieve all flags associated with a specific project using GET /flags/{id_project}
description: Retrieve all flags associated with a specific project using GET /flags/{id_project}

title: Health Check
content: Check if the exploration API is running using GET /health endpoint
description: Check if the exploration API is running using GET /health endpoint

title: Get Scenario
content: Retrieve detailed information about a specific scenario including alternatives and sections using GET /scenario/{id_project}/{id_scenario}
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific scenario including alternatives and sections using GET /scenario/{id_project}/{id_scenario}

title: Get All Scenarios
content: Retrieve a list of all stored scenarios for a given project using GET /scenarios/{id_project}
description: Retrieve a list of all stored scenarios for a given project using GET /scenarios/{id_project}

title: Get Sections
content: Retrieve all current sections an alternative is tracking for a project using GET /sections/{id_project}
description: Retrieve all current sections an alternative is tracking for a project using GET /sections/{id_project}

title: Reset Scenario
content: Store current alternatives as a scenario and reset all stats, tracking data, and overview information using GET /scenario/reset/{id_project}
description: Store current alternatives as a scenario and reset all stats, tracking data, and overview information using GET /scenario/reset/{id_project}

title: Save Scenario
content: Take a snapshot of the current project state and save as scenario without resetting any information using GET /scenario/save/{id_project}
description: Take a snapshot of the current project state and save as scenario without resetting any information using GET /scenario/save/{id_project}
